# Cryptocurrency Price Tracker

> Track real-time prices and 24-hour changes for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, and Solana with automatic updates every minute at https://bitcoin.aolifu.org

## Features
- **Real-Time Prices** - Monitor current prices for major cryptocurrencies with data from OKX.com
- **Automatic Updates** - Prices refresh automatically every 60 seconds with manual refresh option
- **24-Hour Changes** - See price movements with color-coded indicators (green for gains, red for losses)
- **Time Zone Adaptation** - All timestamps displayed in Beijing Time (GMT+8) for easy reference
- **Responsive Design** - Optimized interface for both desktop and mobile devices
- **Bilingual Support** - Interface elements in both Chinese and English

## Key Capabilities
1. Track Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), and Solana (SOL) in real-time
2. View current prices and 24-hour percentage changes at a glance
3. Get automatic price updates every minute without manual page refreshing
4. See exactly when price data was last updated with clear timestamps
5. Access cryptocurrency information on any device with responsive design
